title: AWS Lambda to AWS Secrets Manager
description: Create an AWS Lambda function inside private subnet and access AWS Secrets Manager privately.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This CDK application demonstrates how to establish an AWS Lambda function inside a private subnet of a VPC and access AWS Secrets Manager privately using VPC endpoints.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Pankaj Rawat
authors.bio: Pankaj Rawat is a Lead Consultant at Amazon Web Services.
